name: Birds aren't Real (itch)
description:
Control a "bird" (government spy drone) and listen in on your fellow citizen's private conversations! Explore the park, listen carefully, and report any suspicious behavior! We recommend playing in full screen.

Controls:

WASD: walk          Space: chirp           E:  add to watch-list 

Colin Watterson: Programming, Design, Music

Jameson Danning: Art, Design
